Kaccāyanabheda：Also called Kaccāyanabhedadīpikā．A treatise on Kaccāyana’s grammar，written by Mahāyasa of Thaton，probably about the fourteenth century．A tika on it，called the Sāratthavikāsini，was written by Ariyālankāra．Svd．1250； Bode，op．cit．，36f，but see Gv．74，where the author is called Dhammānanda．
